about.HEADLINE: About us
about.TEXT: As an experienced construction supplier, we offer you high-quality products for construction and renovation projects. Our range includes power trowels, accessories, protective films, and concrete mortar – all made from premium materials. We place great importance on quality, fast delivery, and comprehensive advice to help you carry out your building projects efficiently and successfully. Rely on our expertise and let us support you as a dependable partner for all your construction needs.

welding.HEADLINE: Welding Technology in Metal Construction – Connections That Last
welding.DESCRIPTION_1: In our metal construction company, welding technology is a key element for stable, precise, and durable structures. Whether railings, staircases, gates, or custom fabrications – we join metal with the utmost care and in accordance with the latest technical standards.
welding.LIST_1: MIG/MAG, TIG, and manual arc welding
welding.LIST_2: Processing of steel, stainless steel, and aluminum
welding.LIST_3: Custom solutions for indoor and outdoor applications
welding.LIST_4: Fabrication of components and structures based on plans or measurements
welding.LIST_5: Welding according to DIN EN 1090 and DIN EN ISO 9606 standards
welding.LIST_6: Visual inspection and quality assurance by trained professionals
welding.DESCRIPTION_2: Our welders are qualified and work according to recognized standards. This ensures that every joint is not only technically flawless but also aesthetically clean – for the highest customer satisfaction and long-lasting quality.
welding.LIST_2_4: Custom-built Structures According to Customer Specifications
